name: Scary Ngrombo Teaser
description:
This is teaser of Scary Ngrombo Game.In This teaser, will shown gameplay system and ghosts that show In The Game.Because This is teaser, Of course the purpose Is make you curious.So didn't tell you The story of the game indeed part of story.Eventually the story of game will shown In the full version.Oh, maybe full version of the game have a lot of changes so don't surpised if so differrent with the teaser.

Control Button  : -Up,Down,Right,Left Arrow or W,A,S,D to Move

-Space to Jump -Shift + Move Button(W,A,S,D,And etc) to Run 

 -Enter to Interact or take objects -M to show Map & Clue Menu 

 -Esc to Pause Menu

-M to show Map & Clue Menu

  If you need other helps, you can get it in help menu.

Please donate for help our make better game
